title: PG-DAC , Cdac Acts Pune
description: I completed my PG-DAC `PG Diploma in Advance Computing` from Cdac Acts , Pune

From this course, I gained extensive hands-on experience with core technologies such as Spring Boot, .NET MVC, Microservices, Kafka, Redis, Docker, and AWS. The six-month program had a well-structured and detailed syllabus, which helped me develop strong clarity on both practical implementation and underlying theoretical concepts.

title: Master's from Pune University
description: I completed my Master's in `Industrial Mathematics and Computer Applications` from the Department of Mathematics, Savitribai Phule Pune University.
With a strong mathematical background, I have a solid understanding of Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI-related tasks.

title: Bachelor's from Delhi University
description: I completed my Bachelor's in `Physical Science with Electronics` from Acharya Narendra Dev College, Delhi University.

During college, I was actively involved in various extracurricular activities, including joining the theatre society, Dhwani, and participating in different theatre forms such as street plays, stage plays, and mime.
I took part in various cultural festivals at prestigious institutions like IIT Delhi and IIT Bombay.

title: Higher Secondary Education from Government Inter College, Mainpuri
description: I completed my higher secondary education at Government Inter College, Mainpuri.
